misconceptions.misconception: All engagement photography providers are the same
misconceptions.correction: Quality, experience, and approach can vary significantly. Look for credentials, reviews, and local expertise.

misconceptions.misconception: The cheapest option is always the best value
misconceptions.correction: Price should be weighed against quality, reliability, and what's included. Sometimes paying more saves money long-term.

sources.title: The Ultimate Engagement Photography Session Guide
sources.snippet: Whether you‚Äôre already planning your wedding or just starting this exciting chapter, finding a photographer for your engagement photography session is one of the first steps in savoring this special time. As a wedding photographer who‚Äôs shot hundreds of engagement sessions, both locally and internationally, I‚Äôve put together this guide to help you prepare for your engagement photos in the most fun, laid-back way possible. And if you‚Äôre planning to book your wedding photographer too, many offer discounted engagement sessions, which is an awesome way to get comfortable with your photographer before the big day. If you‚Äôre planning to use your engagement photos for wedding invitations, that gives us enough time to get everything ready. The goal is to make sure we capture your personality and your connection, so I‚Äôll guide you through some engagement photography poses and prompts to make it feel natural and effortless. Want to book Kristi for your luxury wedding, adventure elopement, or engagement session?

sources.title: ENGAGEMENT SHOOT PREP GUIDE
sources.snippet: Talk with each other about what you want your pictures to look like. So make sure you love how you look and feel in the clothes that you pick out! If dresses are not your thing and you hardly ever wear one, don‚Äôt feel pressured to wear one if you want the photos to look sophisticated! You want to look like yourself in these pictures. 3. Make sure everything is all ready the day before so you aren‚Äôt scrounging up your clothes in the morning, you don‚Äôt want to be flustered before your shoot! Since these are your engagement pictures you know I‚Äôm going to want to shoot that bling! 7. Try on your outfit a couple days before the shoot, you want to make sure that you still feel great in it. I do my very best to make sure your pictures don‚Äôt look ‚Äúposed.‚Äù Instead, I will give you a direction and tell you what to do and then you make it your own.

Planning your engagement shoot but feeling nervous? Whether you're camera-shy or a posing pro, this video is your guide to capturing natural, romantic, and unforgettable engagement photos.

In this video, you'll learn:

- 10 simple yet stunning poses that flatter any couple and location.
- Easy-to-follow instructions for mastering each pose, even for beginners.
- Creative tips and tricks to add personality and emotion to your photos.

Business inquiries only -- jessica@gb-dm.com
Instagram -- http://instagram.com/jessicawhitaker
